description.narrative: The proposed additional financing will finance cash grants under the program's nationwide expansion, which as of 2014 includes high school students aged 15-18 years old.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative:
Current Project: Increased consumption and utilization of education and health services among poor households and women beneficiaries of the 4Ps
Overall Project: Household consumption and the use of education and health services by Pantawid families (especially mothers and children) are increased

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
At least 10% increase in average per capita consumption of beneficiaries in target communities.

description.narrative:
Current Project: Increased consumption and utilization of education and health services among poor households and women beneficiaries of the 4Ps
Overall Project: Household consumption and the use of education and health services by Pantawid families (especially mothers and children) are increased

title.narrative: Decrease in the share of children 6-14 years old who are working in project areas (2008 baseline: 4.6%)

description.narrative:
Current Project: Increased consumption and utilization of education and health services among poor households and women beneficiaries of the 4Ps
Overall Project: Household consumption and the use of education and health services by Pantawid families (especially mothers and children) are increased

title.narrative: At least 70% of pregnant women deliver in a health facility (2008 baseline: 44.5%)

Current Project: Increased consumption and utilization of education and health services among poor households and women beneficiaries of the 4Ps
Overall Project: Household consumption and the use of education and health services by Pantawid families (especially mothers and children) are increased

title.narrative: At least 80% of births are delivered by skilled health personnel (2008 baseline: 62.2%)
